text: Harvard's Response to AAU Survey Data

Last spring, Harvard joined a consortium of 27 colleges and universities organized by the American Association for Universities (AAU) in administering the 2015 Campus Climate Survey on Sexual Assault and Sexual Misconduct. The research firm Westat led the design effort, carried out the survey, and conducted the analysis presented in the report.
